entities.description: A weight variable used to create standardized estimates for analysis, such as ANALWT2_C.
Variables used for variance estimation in the analysis, such as VESTR_C and VEREP.
Major Depressive Episode, with specified periods of lifetime and past year.
A condition of major depressive episodes with severe impairment, used for specific estimates.
Estimates for the year 2022 regarding MDE and MDE with severe impairment.

relationships.description: Relates the 2022 estimates to the use of a standard analysis weight for creating estimates.
Relates the 2022 estimates to the variance estimation variables.
Indicates that the 2022 estimates include data on Major Depressive Episodes.
Indicates that the 2022 estimates include data on MDE with severe impairment.
